Name: Healing Potion
Description: A small vial containing a shimmering blue liquid. When consumed, it restores a portion of the user's health.

Name: Salve of Renewal
Description: A soothing ointment with a herbal scent. Applied to wounds, it accelerates natural healing processes.

Name: Elixir of Vitality
Description: A bright green potion that invigorates the drinker. It not only heals but also boosts stamina temporarily.

Name: Healer's Bandage
Description: A roll of specially woven bandage infused with healing herbs. It can be used in the heat of battle to mend wounds.

Name: Precision Barrel
Description: A meticulously crafted barrel that enhances the weapon's accuracy and bullet stability, resulting in more precise shots.

Name: High-Caliber Rounds
Description: Ammunition loaded with larger and more powerful bullets, capable of causing devastating impact upon impact.

Name: Explosive Payload Mod
Description: This modification equips the firearm with rounds that explode upon impact, dealing damage to the target and nearby foes.

Name: Vital Strike Stock
Description: A reinforced stock that provides stability during firing, allowing for better aim and precision targeting.

Name: Venom Infusion Kit
Description: This kit injects specialized toxin into bullets, causing lingering poison damage to targets hit.
